what:
SweCRIS - Grant Decisions From Swedish Funding Bodies And
    EU
title:
SweCRIS - Grant Decisions From Swedish Funding Bodies And
    EU
text: goal swecris R package provide access data SweCRIS, national database allows see participating research funding bodies distributed money Swedish recipients. SweCRIS managed Swedish Research Council behalf Government. R package uses API SweCRIS make data available use R.

title:
SweCRIS - Grant Decisions From Swedish Funding Bodies And
    EU
text: can install development version swecris GitHub :

title:
SweCRIS - Grant Decisions From Swedish Funding Bodies And
    EU
text: Goal: Using bundled data KTH. basic example shows get bundled data projects KTH Royal Institute Technology: Goal: Given organisation, get id get information three associated projects whose funding start date soon :
code: library(swecris) suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(dplyr))  # either fetch data live from the API #kth_projects <- swecris_funding()  # or use the bundled data kthf <- swecris_kth  # top three largest fundings containing abstracts with the word "data" library(dplyr)  fundings <-    kthf %>%   mutate(total_funding = as.numeric(FundingsSek)) %>%   arrange(desc(total_funding)) %>%   filter(grepl("data", ProjectAbstractEn)) %>%   slice(3)  # display an example record fundings %>%   glimpse() #> Rows: 1 #> Columns: 27 #> $ ProjectId                                    <chr> "2017-00630_VR" #> $ ProjectTitleSv                               <chr> "Nationell Infrastruktur … #> $ ProjectTitleEn                               <chr> "National Genomics Infras… #> $ ProjectAbstractSv                            <chr> NA #> $ ProjectAbstractEn                            <chr> "The National Genomics In… #> $ ProjectStartDate                             <dttm> 2018-01-01 #> $ ProjectEndDate                               <dttm> 2020-12-31 #> $ CoordinatingOrganisationId                   <chr> "202100-3054" #> $ CoordinatingOrganisationNameSv               <chr> "KTH, Kungliga tekniska h… #> $ CoordinatingOrganisationNameEn               <chr> "KTH, Royal Institute of … #> $ CoordinatingOrganisationTypeOfOrganisationSv <chr> "Universitet" #> $ CoordinatingOrganisationTypeOfOrganisationEn <chr> "University" #> $ FundingOrganisationId                        <chr> "202100-5208" #> $ FundingOrganisationNameSv                    <chr> "Vetenskapsrådet" #> $ FundingOrganisationNameEn                    <chr> "Swedish Research Council" #> $ FundingOrganisationTypeOfOrganisationSv      <chr> "Stat, regioner, kommune… #> $ FundingOrganisationTypeOfOrganisationEn      <chr> "Governmental" #> $ FundingsSek                                  <dbl> 49450000 #> $ FundingYear                                  <dbl> 2018 #> $ FundingStartDate                             <date> 2018-01-01 #> $ FundingEndDate                               <date> 2020-12-31 #> $ TypeOfAwardId                                <dbl> 5 #> $ TypeOfAwardDescrSv                           <chr> "Forskningsinfrastruktur" #> $ TypeOfAwardDescrEn                           <chr> "Research infrastructure" #> $ InvolvedPeople                               <chr> "¤¤¤32027¤Joakim Lundebe… #> $ Scbs                                         <chr> "¤¤¤ 1: Naturvetenskap, N… #> $ total_funding                                <dbl> 49450000 orgid <-    swecris_organisations() %>%   filter(grepl("^KTH, ", organisationNameSv)) %>%   dplyr::pull(organisationId) %>%   purrr::pluck(1)  kthp <- swecris_projects(orgid)  # three upcoming projects projects <-    kthp %>%    mutate(fsd = lubridate::ymd(fundingStartDate)) %>%   filter(fsd > lubridate::now()) %>%   arrange(desc(fsd)) %>%    select(-starts_with("projectAbstract")) %>%   select(     projectId,      projectTitleEn,      projectStartDate,      projectEndDate,      fundingOrganisationNameEn,      fundingsSek,      fundingYear   ) %>%   head(3)  knitr::kable(projects)

title:
SweCRIS - Grant Decisions From Swedish Funding Bodies And
    EU
text: Goal: Given projects id, get information project associated people SCB classification codes:
code: # some details for a specific project swecris_project("2021-00157_VR") %>% select(-c("projectAbstractEn")) %>% t() #>                                              [,1]                                     #> projectId                                    "2021-00157_VR"                          #> projectTitleSv                               "Petra III svensk nod"                   #> projectTitleEn                               "Petra III Swedish Node"                 #> projectAbstractSv                            ""                                       #> projectStartDate "202100-3054"                            #> coordinatingOrganisationNameSv               "KTH, Kungliga tekniska högskolan"       #> coordinatingOrganisationNameEn               "KTH, Royal Institute of Technology"     #> coordinatingOrganisationTypeOfOrganisationSv "Universitet"                            #> coordinatingOrganisationTypeOfOrganisationEn "University"                             #> fundingOrganisationId                        "202100-5208"                            #> fundingOrganisationNameSv                    "Vetenskapsrådet"                        #> fundingOrganisationNameEn                    "Swedish Research Council"               #> fundingOrganisationTypeOfOrganisationSv      "Stat, regioner, kommuner, församlingar" #> fundingOrganisationTypeOfOrganisationEn      "Governmental"                           #> fundingsSek                                  "25636000"                               #> fundingYear                                  "2023"                                   #> fundingStartDate                             "2023-01-01"                             #> fundingEndDate                               "2026-12-31"                             #> typeOfAwardId                                "5"                                      #> typeOfAwardDescrSv                           "Forskningsinfrastruktur"                #> typeOfAwardDescrEn                           "Research infrastructure"  # some people involved in this project swecris_project_people("2021-00157_VR") #> # A tibble: 4 × 7 #>   project_id    personId fullName       orcId               roleEn roleSv gender #>   <chr>         <chr>    <chr>          <chr>               <chr>  <chr>  <chr>  #> 1 2021-00157_VR 11820    Peter Hedström ""                  Princ… Proje… Male   #> 2 2021-00157_VR 21322    Peter Hedström "0000-0003-1102-43… Princ… Proje… Male   #> 3 2021-00157_VR 13505    Peter Hedström ""                  Princ… Proje… Female #> 4 2021-00157_VR 12329    Peter Hedström ""                  Princ… Proje… Male  # SCB classification codes for this project swecris_project_scbs("2021-00157_VR") #> # A tibble: 2 × 10 #>   project…¹ scb5Id scb5N…² scb5N…³ scb3Id scb3N…⁴ scb3N…⁵ scb1Id scb1N…⁶ scb1N…⁷ #>   <chr>     <chr>  <chr>   <chr>   <chr>  <chr>   <chr>   <chr>  <chr>   <chr>   #> 1 2021-001… 10399  Annan … Other … 103    Fysik   Physic… 1      Naturv… Natura… #> 2 2021-001… 20599  Annan … Other … 205    Materi… Materi… 2      Teknik  Engine… #> # … with abbreviated variable names ¹​project_id, ²​scb5NameSv, ³​scb5NameEn, #> #   ⁴​scb3NameSv, ⁵​scb3NameEn, ⁶​scb1NameSv, ⁷​scb1NameEn

what: Swedish, Danish, Finnish and Norwegian lists
title:
SweCRIS - Grant Decisions From Swedish Funding Bodies And
    EU
text: Goal: part SweCRIS API, mentioned SweCRIS website. Get data Nordic “lists”. Swedish list (first records): Nordic list referenced SweCRIS also provided:
code: sl <-    swecris_list_swedish() #> Rows: 36614 Columns: 12 #> ── Column specification ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────── #> Delimiter: ";" #> chr  (2): ISSN, Titel #> dbl (10): 2012, 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, 2019, 2020, 2021 #>  #> ℹ Use `spec()` to retrieve the full column specification for this data. #> ℹ Specify the column types or set `show_col_types = FALSE` to quiet this message.  glimpse(sl %>% head() %>% collect()) #> Rows: 6 #> Columns: 12 #> $ ISSN   <chr> "8756-9728", "8756-7938", "8756-758X", "8756-6583", "8756-6575"… #> $ Titel  <chr> "Project Management Journal", "Biotechnology progress (Print)",… #> $ `2012` <dbl> 1, NA, 1, 1, 1, 1 #> $ `2013` <dbl> NA, 1, 1, 1, NA, NA #> $ `2014` <dbl> 1, 1, 1, 1, NA, NA #> $ `2015` <dbl> 1, NA, 1, 1, NA, NA #> $ `2016` <dbl> 1, 1, 1, NA, NA, NA #> $ `2017` <dbl> 1, 1, NA, 1, 1, NA #> $ `2018` <dbl> 1, NA, 1, NA, NA, NA #> $ `2019` <dbl> 1, 1, NA, NA, 1, 1 #> $ `2020` <dbl> 1, 1, 1, NA, NA, NA #> $ `2021` <dbl> 1, 1, 1, NA, NA, NA  knitr::kable(sl %>% head() %>% collect()) f <- swecris_list_finnish() n <- swecris_list_norwegian  glimpze <- function(df) {   df %>% head() %>% knitr::kable() }  glimpze(f) glimpze(n)

title: Parse
text: ¤¤¤Peter Hedstroem¤0000-0003-1102-4342¤Principal Investigator¤Projektledare¤Male strings encode dataset equivalent call using swecris_project_people("2021-00157_VR") provide. Instead making multiple API request calls resolve, utility fcn parsing provided.

title: Parse
code: if (FALSE) { if(interactive()){  ip <- swecris_kth$InvolvedPeople  ppl <- purrr::map_dfr(ip, parse_involved_people, .id = "row")  ppl$ProjectId <- swecris_kth[as.integer(ppl$row),]$ProjectId  } }

title: Parse
text: ¤¤¤ 1: Naturvetenskap, Natural Sciences, 103: Fysik, Physical Sciences, 10399: Annan fysik, Physics Topics ¤¤¤ 2: Teknik, Engineering Technology, 205: Materialteknik, Materials Engineering, 20599: Annan materialteknik, Materials Engineering strings encode dataset roughly equivalent call using swecris_project_scbs("2021-00157_VR") provide Instead making multiple API request calls resolve, utility fcn parsing provided.

title: Parse
code: if (FALSE) { if(interactive()){  x <- swecris_kth$Scbs  scb <- purrr::map_dfr(x, parse_scb_codes, .id = "row")  scb$ProjectId <- swecris_kth[as.integer(scb$row),]$ProjectId  } }

Projects data from ORCiD — swecris_projects_from_orcid
text: Given ORCiD, function retrieves information related projects, subject classification codes (.k.scbs) involved people (peopleList)

title: Projects data from ORCiD — swecris_projects_from_orcid
code: if (FALSE) { if(interactive()){  o <- "0000-0003-1102-4342" %>% swecris_projects_from_orcid()  o$projects  o %>% purrr::pluck("peopleList")  o$scbs  } }

swecris 0.1.4
text: Added functions parsing SweCRIS export fields InvolvedPeople Scbs Added updated swecris_kth data corrects earlier outdated fields

title: swecris 0.1.3
text: Added functions searching, getting data specific project related persons SCB codes Refactored functions used older “betasearch” API use new API routes Updated Finnish list work better used Windows OS Added function getting projects data given ORCiD

title: swecris 0.1.2
text: Removed Danish list (longer updated source) Updated Swedish Norwegian list source Updated embedded data projects KTH

title: swecris 0.1.1
text: Added support Swedish, Norwegian, Finnish Danish lists authoritative publication sources

title: swecris 0.1
text: Added basic support routes API described https://swecris-api.vr.se/index.html

title: swecris 0.0.0.9000
text: Added NEWS.md file track changes package.
